notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel-rt SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8. It addresses 12 CVEs: CVE-2022-42896, CVE-2023-2163, CVE-2023-4206, CVE-2023-4207, CVE-2023-4208, and 7 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel-rt security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8
